headline.main: GAMELIN, ILL, MOVED TO HOSPITAL AT PAU; General, 69, Has Erysipelas -- His Condition Held Serious

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 17 -- Five days after being transferred to confinement in the fortress of Portalet, former General Maurice Gustave Gamelin, who is awaiting trial for responsibility of the French defeat by the Supreme Court at Riom, has been moved to a clinic in the neighborhood of Pau.
abstract: Gamelin moved to hosp because of illness
